divs: Sighting DetailsSurf fishing at Topsail Beach, NC approximatley 8 pm. Saw orange globe that was thought to be the moon over the ocean. Then looked up again and saw orange object along with the moon. Object appeared to slowly move north and then split into four smaller objects and then appeared to move slowly north until it disappeared behind the clouds.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Topsail Beach
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: BRIGHT ORANGE GLOBE THAT SPLIT INTO FOUR
